title: DAC (Michigan Department of Health and Human Services)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting copies of records documenting requests for changes or enhancements related to the Medicaid disabled adult child category within Michigan’s integrated eligibility system, as referenced under contract no. 071B7700072, and copies of the associated cost estimates produced by Deloitte to implement these changes. Specifically, I am seeking records that were submitted to or reviewed by:

-DTMB Procurement officials responsible for contract amendments and approvals.
-The DTMB Project Manager(s) overseeing the Bridges eligibility system.

This request should include records for changes that were either in pending status, submitted, or processed between June 30, 2023 and the date of production of this records request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samantha Liss
